results.title: Abridge Moves Upstream With $300M Series E - Digital Health Wire
results.content: Jun 26, 2025 · The ambient AI segment is turning into a bigger spectacle than the NBA Finals, and Abridge just dunked on it with $300M of Series E funding. Big-time startups have big-time valuations. The latest round doubled Abridge ’s valuation to $5.3B, up from a paltry $2.5B when it closed its last nine-figure round four short months ago.

results.title: Abridge secures $300M, boosts valuation to $5.3B
results.content: Jun 25, 2025 · Abridge , a generative AI platform for clinical conversations, has raised $300 million in Series E funding, bringing its valuation to a reported $5.3 billion. Andreessen Horowitz (a16z) led the round , with participation by Khosla Ventures. Abridge offers an enterprise-grade AI platform that converts

results.title: Abridge Inc - 2025 Funding Rounds & List of Investors - Tracxn
results.content: Abridge Inc - 2025 Funding Rounds & List of Investors - Tracxn *   Bessemer Venture Partners, located in Redwood City (United States), made their first investment in Abridge Inc on Oct 06, 2020 in its Series A round. *   Kaiser Permanente Ventures, located in Oakland (United States), made their first investment in Abridge Inc on Oct 26, 2023 in its Series B round. *   Lightspeed Venture Partners, located in Menlo Park (United States), made their first investment in Abridge Inc on Feb 22, 2024 in its Series C round. *   Union Square Ventures, located in New York City (United States), made their first investment in Abridge Inc on Oct 06, 2020 in its Series A round.
